articles.title: Southwest gives workers bonus points to say sorry for holiday meltdown - Business Insider
articles.description: The airline's 66,000 workers will receive 25,000 SWAG points that can be exchanged for flights or gift cards, but a union leader dismissed the offer.
articles.content: Southwest Airlines is giving its 66,000 workers bonus points that can be exchanged for gift cards or other rewards in a bid to apologize for the "physical and emotional toll" of last month's travel c… [+1862 chars]
